title: A Spray of Plum Blossoms (1931) Ruan Lingyu  Ã¤Â¸â‚¬Ã¥â€°ÂªÃ¦Â¢â€¦
description:
Two Gentlemen of Verona finds its way to Chinese silent cinema in this bold and swashbuckling epic. This on seems to have more spirit than the sentimental Peach Blossom.

This version is totally silent (I have removed a soundtrack that was only hiss), thus you will have to select and play your own music. Part of the screen is cut off, and one reel is flipped left-right - it makes for an interesting experience.

Another youtube reseed in flv format.
